name: Bouncy Flip
description:
Bouncy Flip is a simple & very challenging and addictive game. As the two coloured bouncy ball flips, Match the floor's color with the landing part of the ball. Every touch on ground will earn you one point.

Seems easy right? But after trying you will feel how tough and challenging this game is.

Bouncy Flip is simple to learn but hard to master. Have fun!!

Features
~~~~~~~~~~~~

- iOS 10 ready
- Awesome Gameplay music
- Better sound effects
- Randomized Colours
- Game Center intergration
- Enjoy beautiful minimalistic design and relaxing game music

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at - contact@digitalhole.co
